typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 2)) ~> Outputstreamname
Outputstreamname sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		name as string,
		age as integer,
		salary as double
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
